name: Introduction to Media Studies
description: This course introduces students to the field of Media Studies, including its history, theories, and key concepts. It also introduces students to the various methods of analysis used in the field.

name: Media Criticism
description: This course provides an introduction to the theory and practice of media criticism. Students will be introduced to the major theories and approaches to media criticism, as well as the historical and political context in which they emerged.

name: Advanced Media Criticism
description: This course builds on the knowledge and skills acquired in the introductory course in media criticism. It provides an in-depth exploration of the history and theory of media criticism, as well as the contemporary debates and issues in the field.
